name: Running Man Storm
description:
History of the most child heart of the game: wonderful challenge. Endless stairs, endless challenges for players to bring unique and innovative gameplay, thrilling experience.
operating:
Role wonderful control toward the pinnacle of the world non-stop climbing the ladder. Click the button to climb up one step up, click on the button to turn the rotary step upward climb, before time runs out to the highest level.
Climbing process can collect gold coins, gold coins can be used to unlock new heroes.

Features:
1, simple operation makes it easy to get started
2, a variety of scenarios to keep you entertained
3, endless stairs let you thrives
4, beautiful score makes you feel comfortable
